Posts.Content: i wont say all the stuff people try to say that they think will cheer you up because we know how we feel . i would as a fellow suffer advice that you put some something comfortable on and go for a long walk enjoy the sun shine and stay away from the computer. try going somewhere quiet and if you want to cry do it while walking try some music to stop your mind going in to over drive. Â  and please try paul mckenna i can help you sleep i found it after having no sleep for 5 months and found it very very helpful xxxx hope it helps xxxx
Posts.Title: Another Biopsy really scared
